title: Practical data value speculation for future high-end processors.
abstract: Dedicating more silicon area to single thread performance will necessarily be considered as worthwhile in future - potentially heterogeneous - multicores. In particular, Value prediction (VP) was proposed in the mid 90's to enhance the performance of high-end uniprocessors by breaking true data dependencies.
departments: French Institute for Research in Computer Science and Automation
French Institute for Research in Computer Science and Automation
